item.description:
Every two months, the WBOA puts together an evening social event.  We understand that many of you may not be able to make it to our morning breakfast meetings, and the evening social events offer a fun alternative.  These events offer less structure, which gives you time to network and connect with other business women on a deeper level in a more relaxed atmosphere.


When: Thursday October 27, 2011
5:30pm Cash bar and open networking
6:30 Dinner


Where: Cal's Wood-Fired Grill, 1068 Riverdale Street, West Springfield, MA


Cost: $27.00 (Includes Meal, Tax & Tip)
RSVP by Midnight on Wednesday,October 26.


Menu:
Tossed Baby Field Green Salad Freshly Baked Rolls & Butter
 
Entrée Selection:
 
Red Fish Nouvelle
our signature dish, lightly blackened and topped with shrimp, scallops, leaf spinach, and a Mornay sauce, and served with rice pilaf and jalapeno-spiced coleslaw
 
English Style Fish and Chips
with a crisp beer batter, herb-seasoned fires, jalapeno-spiced coleslaw, and tartar sauce
 
Eggplant Napolitan
lightly battered and topped with alouette and provolone cheeses with marinara sauce, served over linguini.
 
Chicken Parmigiana
Cal’s signature version of this classic, served atop linguini pasta with zesty marinara and Parmesan
 
Apple Strudel Freshly Brewed Coffee & Tea
item.name: October Evening Social Event- Cal's Grill & Bar
